en.subject: Your Purra Subscription Has Been Cancelled
en.preheader: We're sorry to see you go

body.intro: Your **{{ planName }}** subscription has been cancelled. You'll continue to have access to all features until **{{ endDate }}**.

accessDetails.title: What Happens Next
items: **Until {{ endDate }}**: Full access to all features continues
**After {{ endDate }}**: Your account will be downgraded to free tier
**Your data**: All reports and data will be preserved
**Reactivation**: You can reactivate anytime before {{ endDate }}

freeAccount.title: Free Account Features
freeAccount.description: After {{ endDate }}, you'll still have access to:

feedback.title: ЁЯТн Help Us Improve
feedback.description: We'd love to hear why you're leaving. Your feedback helps us build a better product for everyone.

body.footer: Changed your mind? You can reactivate your subscription anytime before {{ endDate }} without losing any data.
